text: Palak Lalwani (born 1 January 1998) is an Indian actress who acts in Telugu and Tamil-language films. == Early life == Her father Jiten Lalwani is an Indian television actor who works in Hindi language television series. == Career == She made her debut with the Telugu film Abbayitho Ammayi with Naga Shourya. In 2018, Palak Lalwani featured in a music video Dil Zaffran along with Rahat Fateh Ali Khan, composed by Ravi Shankar and directed by Kamal Chandra. In 2018, she starred in Juvva. In a review of the film by Telangana Today, the reviewer wrote that "Palak Lalwani looks glamorous and fits well in the role of a bubbly girl". In March 2019, Lalwani starred in Crazy Crazy Feeling with Viswant Duddumpudi. She made her Tamil debut in Baba Bhaskar's Kuppathu Raja in 2019. Lalwani played a North Madras girl in the film. Later that year, she played a journalist in Sixer with Vaibhav. Her upcoming films include Sinam with Arun Vijay and Partner with Aadhi Pinisetty and Hansika Motwani. == Filmography == {| class="wikitable sortable" |+Key | style="background:#ffc;"| | Denotes films that have not yet been released |} {| class="wikitable" !Year !Film !Role !Language ! scope="col" class="unsortable" | |- |2016 |Abbayitho Ammayi |Prardhana |Telugu |style="text-align:center;"| |- |2018 |Juvva |Shruthi |Telugu |style="text- align:center;"| |- |2019 |Crazy Crazy Feeling |Spandana |Telugu |style="text- align:center;"| |- |2019 |Kuppathu Raja |Kamala |Tamil |style="text- align:center;"| |- |2019 |Sixer |Krithika |Tamil |style="text-align:center;"| |- |2020 | style="background:#ffc;"| Sinam | |Tamil |style="text- align:center;"| |- |2020 | style="background:#ffc;"| Partner | |Tamil |style="text-align:center;"| |} == References == ==External links== * Category:Indian film actresses Category:Actresses in Telugu cinema Category:Living people Category:21st-century Indian actresses Category:Actresses in Tamil cinema Category:Indian actresses Category:1996 births
